text: Outbreak: Listeria Date: 2011 Details: Jensen Farms in Holly, Colo., about a hundred miles from Rocky Ford, issued a recall of cantaloupe following a Listeria outbreak that killed at Photo: Hyoung Chang, Associated Press Image 10 of 16 Outbreak: Salmonella Date: 2013-14 Details: Chicken products from Foster Farms sickened hundreds of people.
